column1: Table 2-10:  U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions Allocated to Economic Sectors (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent of Total in 2022)
Caprolactam, Glyoxal, and Glyoxylic Acid Production
SF6 and PFCs from Other Product Use
+ Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq. or 0.05 percent.
a Percent of total (gross) emissions excluding emissions from LULUCF for 2022.
b Includes CH4 and N2O emissions from fuel combustion.
c The LULUCF sector net total is the net sum of all LULUCF CH4 and N2O emissions to the atmosphere plus LULUCF net carbon stock changes.

Notes: Total gross emissions presented are without LULUCF. Total net emissions are presented with LULUCF. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate negative values or sequestration.
